name: Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail with mint, lime, and rum.
recipe: Mix mint, lime, sugar, and rum. Add ice and soda water.

name: Margarita
description: A tangy cocktail with tequila, lime, and Cointreau.
recipe: Shake tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau with ice. Serve with salt rim.

name: Old Fashioned
description: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, bitters, sugar, and water.
recipe: Muddle sugar with bitters, add whiskey and ice, stir well, and garnish with an orange peel.

name: Pi√±a Colada
description: A sweet cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.
recipe: Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice until smooth. Serve with a slice of pineapple.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and freshly squeezed lime juice.
recipe: Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
